p: Reduced PRNP mRNA expression levels were previously observed in the frontal cortex of sCJD patients [ 22], where the cellular function of PrP was lost due its conversion to PrP scrapie, and the abnormal imaging patterns detectable in the cerebral cortex of CJD-affected patients are well characterized [ 23]. MCT1 mRNA expression and immunoreactivity were identified as markedly diminished in the same brain area of sCJD as compared to control patients [ 16]. Therefore, investigating the differential cortical mRNA expression of genes engaged in neuroenergetics seemed to be a relevant issue.
